item.title: ‘Cancer Doesn’t Care’: Citizen Lobbyists Unite To Push Past Washington’s Ugly Politics
item.description: Despite a poisonous political climate, hundreds of volunteer advocates put partisan differences aside and pressed Congress to help people with cancer.

item.title: Luego de criticar a demócratas por su política transgénero, Newsom veta una medida de salud clave
